title: skyfall.dev
description: My main personal site, built with Astro and Tailwind!

title: Archimedes
description: A helpful newspaper bot for Hack Club - handles story writing, editor approvals, and auto-generation of both Slack messages and newsletter emails

title: High Seas Monitor
description: Real-time inventory and price alerts for Hack Club's High Seas Shop

title: High Seas v2
description: A faster, more optimised version of the High Seas website. Scaled to 600+ users across 2 days. Also includes High Seas Wrapped, a Spotify Wrapped clone for High Seas (used over 500 times)

title: Phantom
description: A fantasy OS for the web - includes a persisted filesystem, terminal history, Python support and more!

title: Pocketbrain
description: A fast Brainf**k interpreter, with tests and full language support

title: Vortex Email
description: Ad-free temporary email service with 10+ (sub)domains for maximum flexibility

title: WakaTime for Figma
description: Browser extension that brings WakaTime's time-tracking capabilities to Figma
